reviewText: The videos are very informative.  The production quality is slightly above an average youtube video.  Very lacking on audio narration, and lots of dead air on video.  The video could have been edited a lot tighter and much shorter.  The background production music is repetitive, and actually sickening, being repeated all the way through.  The recipes are listed very quickly on the screen, and there is no on screen anything.  Overall good information...  Really lacking on production and editing and technical.  You would have to watch a lot of youtube videos to get all of this information.

We bought this set of 4 Chinese Take-Out Cooking DVDs about a year ago as a gift for my daughter. This turned out to be gift to ourselves as she has taken to cooking some of the dishes for us once a month or so. While each DVD covers a specific area, they all some things in common: * The ingredient list is very quickly shown at start of section, so it is best to pause and write them down because they are not always identified as the dish is being prepared. * They also point you to their web site for spice and ingredient info. I should note that there is a lot of good information and tips on the site. * They reference other videos in the series for more detailed instructions * The video was shot without benefit of a tripod, so it can be a little jumpy and a little distracting * The background music is somewhat repetitive and also a little distracting To see the detailed reviews of each individual DVD, see the product listing: Chinese Take-out Main Course Cooking DVD Demonstrations: Cutting and Cooking Techniques Preparation of Meats, Vegetables and Sauces Chicken & Broccoli Beef & Mixed Vegetables Chicken Curry Shrimp with Garlic Sauce Chinese Take-out Specialty Dishes Cooking DVD Dish Demonstrations Pepper Steak Double Cooked Pork Ma Po Tofu Egg Foo Young Shrimp with Lobster Sauce Chinese Take-out Soups and Appetizers Cooking DVD Contents Include: Wonton Soup Egg Drop Soup Fried Wontons Egg Rolls Bar-B-Que Spare Ribs Char Siu (Sweet Roasted Pork) Special Chinese Sauces Chinese Take-out Cooking Noodles and Rice DVD Dish Demonstrations: Stove Rice Cooker Rice Chicken Fried Rice Chicken Chow Mein Vegetable Mei Fun Shrimp Lo Mein Beef Chow Fun This is a very good video set and it does exactly what it advertises, teach you how to quickly make popular Take-out dishes. Highly Recommended! CFH
